name: Corona-The Game
description:
Hey! This is our new short, 3-level game, where you, Dr. Vir Uskill Er, have to defeat viruses, collect medicines and vaccines, and a patient to test on, and then approve it. There's an easy mode and a HARDCORE mode.

Easy mode: viruses don't attack

HARDCORE: Yes, viruses attack and you have to restart EVERYTHING.

v2.5.0

Mobile support coming soon.
